fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day or night, select a player to detain. This resolves immediately during the day.
- At night, use a bulletproof vest, can be used with your first ability. 3 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Detaining a player will send them to jail.
- Players in jail are functionally dead, but do not have access to the dead chat.
- All players learn if a player is detained.
- Once you die, detained players can be broken out by another player visiting them.
- You cannot detain the current and next phase after detaining 1 Townie. You are fired (dead) after detaining 2 Townies.
- You may detain as many times per phase as you wish, as long as you do not detain a Townie.
